name: SEO Opportunity Miner
description: Analyzes Search Console data to surface quick-win SEO opportunities and prioritize fixes.
when_to_use: Use when you need fast recommendations to improve rankings and CTR using existing Search Console performance data.

inputs.search_console_rows: List of SearchConsoleRow records containing query, page, impressions, clicks, and position.
inputs.site_pages: Optional list of known site URLs used to validate recommendations.

outputs.page_url: URL of the prioritized page to improve
outputs.issue_type: Type of SEO issue detected (ctr, rank, or cannibalization)
outputs.recommended_fix: Recommended actions to capture the opportunity
outputs.estimated_impact: Expected outcome from applying the fix

frequency: On-demand or daily checks depending on pipeline
